graphics.awt

Class BufferedFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • graphics.awt.BufferedFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BufferedDevice, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class BufferedFrame
extends java.awt.Frame
implements BufferedDevice
    An extension of the Frame class with built-in double-buffered image drawing and manipulation functions.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • BufferedFrame

        public BufferedFrame(int x,
                     int y,
                     int width,
                     int height,
                     java.lang.String title)
        Creates a new BufferedFrame. Uses default mouse and key listeners.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-value of the frame's location on the screen.
        y - The y-value of the frame's location on the screen.
        width - The frame's width.
        height - The frame's height.
        title - The title of the frame.

      • BufferedFrame

        public BufferedFrame(int x,
                     int y,
                     int width,
                     int height,
                     java.lang.String title,
                     Mouselistener mouselisten,
                     Keylistener keylisten)
        Creates a new BufferedFrame.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-value of the frame's location on the screen.
        y - The y-value of the frame's location on the screen.
        width - The frame's width.
        height - The frame's height.
        title - The title of the frame.
        mouselisten - The frame's mouse listener.
        keylisten - The frame's key listener.

      • drawImage

        public Sprite drawImage(java.awt.Image image,
                        int x,
                        int y)
        Draws an image.
        Specified by:
        drawImage in interface BufferedDevice
        Parameters:
        image - The image you want drawn.
        x - The x-value of the image's upper-left corner on the destination frame.
        y - The y-value of the image's upper-left corner on the destination frame.
        Returns:
        The generated sprite containing the image identifier and the display coordinates of the image.

      • drawImage

                        int y,
                        int endx,
                        int endy)
        Draws an image.
        Specified by:

      • drawImage

        public Sprite drawImage(java.awt.Image image,
                        int x,
                        int y,
                        int endx,
                        int endy,
                        int srcx1,
                        int srcy1,
                        int srcx2,
                        int srcy2)
        Draws an image.
        Specified by:
        drawImage in interface BufferedDevice
        Parameters:
        image - The image you want drawn.
        x - The x-value of the image's upper-left corner on the destination frame.
        y - The y-value of the image's upper-left corner on the destination frame.
        endx - The x-value of the image's lower-right corner on the destination frame.
        endy - The y-value of the image's lower-right corner on the destination frame.
        srcx1 - The x-value of the upper-left corner of the bounds on the source image.
        srcy1 - The y-value of the upper-left corner of the bounds on the source image.
        srcx2 - The x-value of the bottom-right corner of the bounds on the source image.
        srcy2 - The y-value of the bottom-right corner of the bounds on the source image.
        Returns:
        The generated sprite containing the image identifier and the display coordinates of the image.

      • changeMouseListener

        public void changeMouseListener(Mouselistener mouselisten)
        Changes the device's mouselistener. If one was not added, replaces the DefaultMouselistener in use with the inputted Mouselistener.
        Specified by:
        changeMouseListener in interface BufferedDevice
        Parameters:
        mouselisten - The Mouselistener to use.
